column2: IDEA-189919 provide a setting for property comments not convert to ascii

column3: Provide a feature like eclipse properties editor plugin£º

default behavior is convert comments, if you don't want to convert comments to ascii,  a string below need add to the $IDEA_INSTALLATION/bin/idea.properties
idea.native2ascii.skip.comments=true

then, you need to add a string to tell IDEA what line sperator in use.  by default, it is "
",you can change to "
" or ""
idea.native2ascii.line.separator=
IDEA-189919 Makes property comments not converted to ascii settings
